title: Create Interactive Triangulation Plot with Matplotlib
description: This lab will guide you through creating a triangulation plot using Matplotlib. You will learn how to create a Triangulation object, use a TriFinder object, and set up interactivity to highlight the triangle under the cursor.

meta.title: Create Interactive Triangulation Plot with Matplotlib
meta.description: Learn how to create a triangulation plot using Matplotlib, including creating a Triangulation object and using a TriFinder object for interactivity.
meta.keywords: matplotlib, python, data visualization, triangulation, trifinder
